statements: DELETE FROM currency_exchange_rates WHERE id = 1 AND currency_code = 'USD';
DELETE FROM exchange_rates WHERE currency_code = 'USD' AND exchange_rate < 0.75;
DELETE FROM trip_expenses WHERE expense_category = 'Accommodation' AND trip_id = 123456 AND expense_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM trip_expenses WHERE expense_amount > 1000.00 AND expense_currency = 'USD';
DELETE FROM trip_expenses WHERE trip_id = 3 AND expense_id = 7;
DELETE FROM trips WHERE trip_id = 100 AND destination = 'Paris';
